column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////These guys know their pastries!!! Their macaroons
column2: chocolate chip walnut cookie and Kugelhopf are popular
column3: but the croissants are the absolute BEST in my opinion! They're huge
column4: fluffy and just ridiculously delicious! I don't think there are much better ones out there! My husband enjoys their coffee
column5: which is in line with the high standards in the Montrose area. Yes
column6: the parking is a bit frustrating and can get quite crowded during brunch hours
column8: beautiful space with indoor and outdoor seating and excellent pastries can't be beat!
